data.system_settings: Dell Latitude E5540 (Intel Core i7 vPro) with Windows 10 Pro, x64 bit... Version 1703, OS Build 15063.674
data.actual_result: NSFW feature turns off automatically, there is nothing about it in the aduit log and I am the only admin. This happens after some extended period of time, as it is not a right away result.
data.expected_result: NSFW content is turned on for the channel, and stays that way unless settings are changed
data.short_description: NSFW Feature Automatically Unticks in Server after a Period of Time.
data.steps_to_repro: -Use a server, or create a new one.-Create a channel, or use one.-Go to Channel Settings, then turn on NSFW content.-Supervise the server for a few hours to a few days (maybe switch between desktop and phone, but it's optional.)
